title: US Senate passes GAIN Act, prioritizing domestic AI and HPC chip sales
contentSnippet: The provision in the National Defense Authorization Act could create even more economic pain for the crypto mining industry if passed.

title: Astaroth Banking Trojan Harnessing GitHub to Steal Crypto Credentials
contentSnippet: The keylogging malware is capable of using GitHub to redirect itself to new servers whenever existing servers go offline.

title: Gamble with your crypto? Sure. Gamble with your future? Don't do it.
contentSnippet: After yesterday's multibillion dollar leveraged crypto wipeout, traders are licking their wounds — but those who cannot remember the past are condemned to repeat it.

title: Zcash recovers to pre-crash highs following crypto market meltdown
contentSnippet: ZEC recovered all its value lost during Friday's market meltdown and also hit a recent high of $291 before dipping to the $270 level.

title: XRP Rebounds Sharply After 41% Flash Crash, Reclaims $2.47 Support
contentSnippet: The session’s $1.14 range — from $2.77 down to $1.64 — was one of the widest in XRP’s 2025 trading history, driven by macro-led deleveraging and heavy futures liquidations across major venues.

title: Is a Presidential Pardon in the Works for Binance Founder CZ?
contentSnippet: The Trump administration is reportedly weighing a pardon for Binance founder Changpeng “CZ” Zhao, who served prison time after pleading guilty to a money laundering violation.

title: AAVE Sees 64% Flash Crash as DeFi Protocol Endures 'Largest Stress Test'
contentSnippet: The largest decentralized lending protocol processed $180 million collateral liquidation within an hour on Friday, proving its resilience, founder Stani Kulechov said.

title: Blockchain Will Drive the Agent-to-Agent AI Marketplace Boom
contentSnippet: For agents to be truly autonomous they need to have access to resources and self-custody their assets: programmable, permissionless, and composable blockchains are the ideal substrate for agents to do

title: ‘Largest Ever’ Crypto Liquidation Event Wipes Out 6,300 Wallets on Hyperliquid
contentSnippet: The sell-off erased over $1.23 billion in trader capital on Hyperliquid and $19 billion across the crypto market in a 24 hours.

title: Bitcoin’s On-Chain Strength Sets Stage for Fourth-Quarter Gains, Says Cathie Wood's ARK Invest
contentSnippet: ARK Invest says bitcoin’s strong fundamentals, rising institutional demand and macro tailwinds could fuel gains, though timing remains key.

title: Bitcoin, Ethereum, Dogecoin Down Bad Amid Record $19 Billion in Crypto Liquidations
contentSnippet: Bitcoin fell and altcoins crated Friday after President Trump ratcheted up his threats against China, fueling record crypto liquidations.

title: ‘Bitcoin Is Not an Asset Class,’ Says One of UK’s Largest Retail Investment Platforms
contentSnippet: Hargreaves Lansdown says bitcoin lacks intrinsic value and shouldn’t be part of portfolios, even as it prepares to launch crypto ETN trading for clients early next year.

title: Norwegian Officials Probe Major Polymarket Bets on Nobel Peace Winner
contentSnippet: A trader with a new account and no prior betting history placed a $70,000 bet on Venezuelan opposition leader Maria Corina Machado winning the prize.

title: State of Crypto: Market Structure Negotiations?
contentSnippet: A proposed regulatory framework for DeFi has the industry up in arms.

title: AI-powered wearables will force our privacy norms to change
contentSnippet: AI wearables will harvest our most intimate data while we pretend privacy still exists. Cryptography could enable us to keep our privacy.

title: DOGE Suffers 50% Flash Crash Before Stabilizing Near $0.19
contentSnippet: The move wiped out billions in nominal value, triggered cascading liquidations.

title: Six global policy changes that affected crypto this week
contentSnippet: Major policy changes worldwide are shaping how the crypto industry will operate.

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
contentSnippet: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

title: Crypto.com CEO calls for probe into exchanges after $20B liquidations
contentSnippet: Crypto.com CEO Kris Marszalek has urged regulators to probe exchanges after $20 billion in liquidations, far outpacing any previous market crash, including FTX.

title: Three Bitcoin charts to watch after BTC price’s flash crash to $103K
contentSnippet: BTC’s price decline is relatively less severe than what occurred before significant reversals in the past, suggesting that Bitcoin may continue its uptrend.

title: Gold-Backed Tokens Hold Firm in $19B Crypto Rout, but Rally May Be Near Exhaustion
contentSnippet: Gold-backed tokens have been a refuge for crypto investors, with year-to-date gains of over 50%, mirroring gold's historic rally.

title: Galaxy Digital raises $460M to transform Texas Bitcoin mine into AI data center
contentSnippet: Mike Novogratz’s Galaxy Digital has secured a $460 million investment to convert its former Bitcoin mining site in Texas into a large-scale AI data center.

title: Bitcoin wobbles at $110K as trader says $20B liquidation rout not 'bottom'
contentSnippet: Bitcoin stayed near three-week lows after a giant $20 billion liquidation cascade, but crypto market predictions warned that the bottom was not yet in.

title: ビットコインの年間の実現純利益が継続的上昇、今後の動向は＝CryptoQuant
contentSnippet: CryptoQuantが週間レポートで仮想通貨ビットコインの利確の動きは低調であるとして今後も上昇継続の可能性を予想した。一方、市場はトランプ関税発言で急落したところだ。

title: ケニア最大級のスラム街でビットコインが広がる理由｜Afribit創業者インタビュー
contentSnippet: ケニアの貧困地域で広がるビットコイン活用。なぜ使われ、どんな課題があるのか。現地取材による5つの質問と回答で、仮想通貨の実態をわかりやすく紹介。

title: 「トランプ・ショック」でアルト市場に異常値　ATOMが一時0.001ドルまで暴落
contentSnippet: トランプ大統領の対中関税警告で一部アルトコインがバイナンスなどで異常急落。ATOMは0.001ドルまで暴落しSUIは85%下落。過去24時間の清算総額は約3兆円に達した。

title: ノーベル平和賞めぐる情報漏洩か、ノルウェー当局が米賭けサイトのトレーダーに関する調査＝報道
contentSnippet: ノルウェー当局が2025年ノーベル平和賞の結果についてポリマーケットでの情報漏洩を調査している。受賞者マチャド氏は仮想通貨ビットコインの支持者として知られている。

title: 米賭けサイト「カルシ」、3億ドル調達で評価額50億ドルに　140カ国展開へ
contentSnippet: 米予測市場カルシが3億ドルの資金調達を完了し評価額50億ドルに到達。セコイアやアンドリーセン・ホロウィッツが参加し事業を140カ国に拡大する計画を発表した。

title: 世界大手銀行10行、G7通貨のステーブルコイン発行を共同検討
contentSnippet: バンカメやゴールドマン・サックスなど世界大手銀行10行がG7通貨連動ステーブルコイン発行の共同検討を開始とBNPパリバが発表した。

title: 32億円相当の仮想通貨を盗難か　Hyperliquidのユーザーが被害者に＝Peckshield
contentSnippet: Peckshieldは、Hyperliquidのユーザーが32億円相当の仮想通貨を盗難されたことを報告。原因は秘密鍵の漏洩であると分析している。

title: キャナリー、XRPとソラナETFの申請を更新も長引く政府閉鎖が影響
contentSnippet: 米キャナリー・キャピタルがXRPとソラナETFの登録届出書を更新し手数料を0.50%に設定。SEC承認に向け前進するも政府閉鎖で承認プロセスが不透明な状況にとどまる。

title: モルガン・スタンレー、仮想通貨ファンドの顧客制限を撤廃＝報道
contentSnippet: モルガン・スタンレーが仮想通貨ファンドへのアクセス制限を撤廃し全顧客が投資可能にとCNBCが報道。10月15日から退職金口座を含むあらゆる口座で利用可能になる。

title: Public Keys: BlackRock Bitcoin Fee Frenzy, S&P Catchall and New York Stakes
contentSnippet: BlackRock's Bitcoin ETF tops profit charts while Coinbase breaks into NY's staking market. Plus: S&P's new hybrid crypto index.

title: Aster Airdrop Delayed Due to 'Data Inconsistencies' With Token Allocations
contentSnippet: Decentralized perps exchange Aster has delayed its airdrop due to issues around token allocations, following complaints from users.

title: Bank of America, Citi and Goldman Sachs Among Banks Exploring Joint Stablecoin
contentSnippet: Top banks including Bank of American, Goldman Sachs, and Citi are exploring issuing a stablecoin, according to a Friday announcement.

title: Red Uptober? Crypto Liquidations Top $1 Billion as Bitcoin, Ethereum and Solana Erase Gains
contentSnippet: So much for "Uptober." Bitcoin plunged Friday while Ethereum and Solana fell to October lows after President Trump's latest tariffs salvo.

title: Polymarket Token Is Coming, But Likely Not This Year: Sources
contentSnippet: Polymarket is focused on re-entering the U.S. market before the prediction market attempts to launch a token.

title: Hyperliquid User Loses $21 Million Due to Private Key Compromise, Experts Say
contentSnippet: After having their private key leaked, a Hyperliquid user lost $21 million—a painful reminder of the importance of personal security.

title: Don't Buy Bitcoin, Warns UK Investment Giant Hargreaves Lansdown—Here's Why
contentSnippet: British investment platform Hargreaves Lansdown has warned users to stay away from Bitcoin, saying crypto has "no intrinsic value."
